reviewText: It should have contained at least one other classroom where the strategies are used, say a urban elementary school setting. The school setting here was fine, but it needed more variety. Although everyone should know what ADHD is, it was too clinical here. We are a school and what we relie on is strategies, But for all purposes, this fit the bill. please get some more type of viewings like this but more up to date. Oh - definitely include strategies on autism
